index.description: TON wallet allows you to make fast and secure blockchain-based payments without intermediaries.

seed-creating.description: Get ready to write down the secret key. This is the only way to regain access to the wallet. It is safest not to store the key onthe devices.
seed-creating.no-seed-error: Sorry we can't generate seed, go back and try again

seed-checking.description: To make sure you spelled the words correctly, enter words

seed-back-uping.description: Write these 12 words in exactly that order and hide them in a safeplace.

connect-wallet.description: To restore access, enter the 24 secret words you received whencreating a wallet
connect-wallet.scannned-error: Scanned Seed is not valid try other
connect-wallet.format-error: Seed Phrase does not have correct format, make sure to put 12 word and remove extra spaces

password-setup.description: We Will use your Password for secure your Seed Phrase, so createStrong Password
password-setup.password-setup-description: We Will use your Password for secure your Seed Phrase, so create Strong Password
password-setup.password-min-length: Password must contain at least 8 characters

add-custom-token.warning-second: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
add-custom-token.warning-third: If you purchase this token, you may not be able to sell it back.
add-custom-token.warning-forth: Buy adding this as a custom token, you confirm that all further interactions with it are at your own risk.

recieve-details.warning: only. Do not send other chain here!

send.warning: Check Adress Before Send, you cen't refund it

swap-in-progress.description: Your transaction has been sent to the network and will be processed in a few seconds
